root.text: You wake up in a strange land. A shadow moves in the distance. Call out Stay hidden

CALL_OUT.text: A woman approaches. Aria: Who are you? Are you hurt? Ask for help Stay silent

HIDE.text: You hide behind a tree. Kael: I saw you. No use hiding. Surrender Run

ASK_HELP.text: Aria brings you to a village. Mira: We can give you shelter, but we must test your soul. Accept the test Refuse

STAY_SILENT.text: Aria frowns. Aria: If you won’t speak, I can’t help. Walk away Follow her silently

SURRENDER.text: Kael smiles. Kael: Brave. Come with me. Follow Kael Refuse

RUN.text: You trip and fall. END. THE END.

FOLLOW_ARIA.text: You follow Aria into the village. Mira: You have courage. Stay here. Accept her offer Leave the village

FOLLOW_KAEL.text: Kael shows you a hidden ruin. Kael: Touch the stone, claim your fate. Touch the stone Walk away

TEST.text: You pass the test. The villagers cheer. Mira: You are one of us now. Stay forever Leave in peace

END_SHELTER.text: You are safe and live a peaceful life. THE END.

END_LOST.text: You get lost in the wild and are never found. THE END.

END_POWER.text: You gain immense power but lose your humanity. THE END.

END_SAFE.text: You walk away and return to normal life. THE END.

END_REFUSE.text: You walk away into the unknown. THE END.
